title: Exemplary Quality of Financial Regulations
description: In 2024, Hungary achieved a remarkable score of 99.44 in the B-READY Financial Services Pillar 1, showcasing its top-tier regulatory quality for financial services.

title: Outstanding Access to Safe Drinking Water in Rural Areas
description: By 2022, 100% of Hungary's rural population had access to safely managed drinking water services, reflecting the country's commitment to public health.

title: Robust Growth in Agriculture, Forestry, and Fishing
description: In 2023, Hungary's agriculture, forestry, and fishing sectors experienced a significant growth rate of 68.67%, indicating a thriving primary sector.

title: Minimal Mineral Rents Contribution to GDP
description: In 2018, mineral rents contributed a negligible 0.00003% to Hungary's GDP, highlighting a limited reliance on mineral resources.

title: Substantial Net Primary Income Outflow
description: In 2022, Hungary experienced a significant net primary income outflow of -1,184,208,756,000 constant LCU, indicating a considerable income transfer abroad.

title: Low Foreign Direct Investment Outflows
description: In 2023, Hungary's foreign direct investment net outflows were -34.80% of GDP, suggesting limited outward investment activities.

title: Minimal Contribution to Global Aid
description: In 2017, Hungary's net ODA provided was only 0.11% of GNI, reflecting a modest contribution to international aid efforts.
